item.title: [639] Wise Old Man/Crystal Key Chest
item.dc:creator: @THC_Austin THC_Austin
item.description:
@THC_Austin wrote:

So in the dementhium source that I am using, there is a wise old man that you can exchange your crystal keys to for 500k and I wanted to make it so that you have a chance of receiving other items randomly from him.

In dialogue manager it says:

	case 4201:
	if (!player.getInventory().contains(989)) {
	player.sendMessage("Convertion failed, you don't have a Crystal Key.");
	} else {
	player.getInventory().contains(989);
	player.getInventory().addItem(995, 500000);
	player.sendMessage("You have succesfully exchanged your Key.");
	player.getInventory().deleteItem(989, 1);
	player.getInventory().refresh();
	}

Help would be much appreciated.

Read full topic
